reviews.review_msg: She focused on curriculum and teaching theory. Her class was graded by several group projects, all of which are easy to succeed for students with an interest in education. Many international students also took the class as a grade booster which makes it even easier to score well for education students.

Jacky is an amazing prof and EDUC370 with her was one of the best classes of my 5 years in university. I HIGHLY recommend taking a class with her! She is down to earth and really cares about social justice, which she makes easy to understand in today's world. She uses lots of videos and great examples when teaching to make material relatable.

If you want to take 382, make SURE to take it with Jacky. She shares so many of her personal stories and genuinely loves to teach and open dialogue for students to feel safe and respected. Marking is super easy as long as you ask her for feedback and listen in class! Lecture can feel long but the course is very calm and Jacky makes it enjoyable.
easy to do very well in her courses her assignments are simple and she is a generous marker. you just need to show up and do the work
